background_image_description: Full-canvas movie poster composite on a light off-white to gray cloudy backdrop. Foreground features a stylish man in a gray coat with black leather glove, wristwatch, and tortoiseshell sunglasses, facing left. His torso is double-exposed with a city skyline at sunset, an orange glow radiating around a very tall central skyscraper. The right side of his figure dissolves into scattered orange and black shards/particles, blending into the background.

nodes.asset_description: Composite artwork: cloudy light background, central left male figure wearing sunglasses and glove, double-exposed with orange sunset city skyline and a very tall skyscraper; right side of figure dissolves into particles.

nodes.text: LARS PEETERS | DREW FEIG | SAMIRA HADID
